Text.Value: Why did you target the inn?
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*
Where were you trying to take the Duke?
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
Kidnap... the Duke... for the Absolute...
What were you doing at the inn?
Why were you after the Duke?

Synopsis: The Cult of the Absolute has ransacked the inn at Waukeen's Rest and kidnapped Duke Stelmane of Baldur's Gate. The player arrives after the carnage, finding corpses strewn about. The player casts 'Speak with Dead' on one of these corpses - one of the goblin raiders. He was killed chasing a child through the inn.
